messages.subject: Puberty: was Re: Parental Crisis
messages.msgSnippet: ... I have a 10 and an almost 12 year old, both boys. I ve been thinking a lot lately about a rite of passage ceremony for them... prolly at age 13. I d love
messages.messageBody:
> Intellectually, I knew my son was growing up. But I don't think with my
> head, I think with my heart. And my heart is several years behind. So if
> you see me this week, give me a comforting hug. Here is how you will
> recognize me: there will be tears in my eyes and I'll be holding Colton's old
> teddy bear.

I have a 10 and an almost 12 year old, both boys. I've been thinking a lot
lately about a rite of passage ceremony for them... prolly at age 13. I'd
love to hear what others have done for their children to welcome them into
adulthood.
--
Thea
metta@...
